problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,半径OC⊥AB于点D,∠A=36°,点P在圆周上,则∠P等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of O, the radius OC ⊥ AB is at the vertex D, ∠A = N_0, and the vertex P is on the circle, then ∠P is equal to ()
raw_answer:
解:∵半径OC⊥AB于点D,∴⁀{AC}=⁀{BC},∴∠AOC=2∠P,∴△AOD是直角三角形,∴∠AOC=90°-∠A=54°,∴∠P=27°．
故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了圆周角定理,垂径定理,熟练掌握定理是解题的关键．
